question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/utils/sources/utils.move] [Function: split_coin()] [State Race] Between coin::split() on line 17 and public_transfer on line 24, can another transaction modify vault state causing inconsistency in expected coin holdings? (Medium)

(High)
